alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:21PM CDT until July 17 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Fulton County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 520 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Gainesville, or 20 miles north of Mountain Home, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Briarcliff... Bexar... Diamond Bay... Gamaliel Landing... Vidette... Clarkridge... Gamaliel... Elizabeth... Mitchell... Robinson Point Landing... Wild Cherry... Henderson... Gepp... Norfork Lake... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
